commandDescription: Removes all boilerplate Aura related files that have not been modified
questionDeletionPrompt: Make sure that your git commits are up-to-date before you proceed. Do you want to delete boilerplate Aura related files that have not been modified?
msgNoAuraFilesInPackageDirectories: No Aura files found in package directories.
successMessage: %s non-modified boilerplate Aura files have been deleted in package directory '%s'.
errorNoSfdxProject: The command isn't run from within a Salesforce DX project folder.
